newsitem.title: INDIA: At least 20 killed in India temple fire.
newsitem.headline: At least 20 killed in India temple fire.

text.p: At least 20 people were killed on Saturday when fire broke out in a temple in the southern Indian town of Thanjavur, the United News of India (UNI) quoted police as saying.
UNI said the fire was caused by crackers and the toll could be much higher.
UNI said a local festival was scheduled to be held in the temple on Sunday.
Further details were awaited, UNI said.
